{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking for the lower limit of the range within which 95% of the population's blood pressure would fall. This is a statistics question and can be solved using the concept of standard deviation. In a normal distribution, approximately 95% of values fall within two standard deviations of the mean. So, to find the lower limit of the range, we subtract two standard deviations from the mean.", "answer_choice": "A"}
